results.title: Chemobrain: A review on mechanistic insight, targets and treatments.
results.text_hl: Based on recent research, potential agents to prevent and treat @<m>DISEASE_Chemotherapy_Related_Cognitive_Impairment</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000084202 @@@chemo@@@ @DISEASE_Brain_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001927 @@@brain@@@ have been identified, which include @CHEMICAL_Lithium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008094 @@@Lithium@@@, @CHEMICAL_Fluoxetine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005473 @@@Fluoxetine@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Rolipram @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020889 @@@Rolipram@@@, @CHEMICAL_astaxanthine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C005948 @@@Astaxanthin@@@, and microglial inhibitors.

results.title: A phase I delayed-start, randomized and pharmacodynamic study of metformin and chemotherapy in patients with solid tumors.
results.text_hl: In Stage 1, we randomized @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ to two arms: concurrent arm (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Chemotherapy_Related_Cognitive_Impairment</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000084202 @@@chemo@@@) vs. delayed arm (@<m>DISEASE_Chemotherapy_Related_Cognitive_Impairment</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000084202 @@@chemo@@@ alone).
